metadata.title: CVE-2023-24535 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Parsing invalid messages can panic. Parsing a text-format message whichcontains a potential number consisting of a minus sign, one or morecharacters of whitespace, and no further input will cause a panic.

criterions.comment: golang-goprotobuf: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
google-guest-agent: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
